short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Serious pump.fun traders add extra multiples to their trades with Potion Vision

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Potion Vision, you can:
• Save time sifting through 100's of memecoins on BullX's Pump Vision or Photon's Memescope
• Get earlier entries using real-time data overlaid on each token
• Gain your edge with unique insights on dev, holders, and socials
• Find tokens using new filters and save your favorite combinations
• Make the grind easier with browser notifications, alerts, and more

HOW:
Behind the scenes, Potion Vision collects unique on-chain/off-chain data and insights about every memecoin created on Solana's pump.fun. Then, when you're looking for newly created tokens on Pump Vision (NEO supported) or Memescope, the Chrome Extension will overlay all the analytics in real-time.

SETUP:
Connect your X account, download the Chrome Extension, and in less than 5 minutes, you're back to trading. 

FROM:
The Potion Alpha team, a leading community in the Solana ecosystem, develops Potion Vision.

SAFETY:
We take security seriously. Please visit our website to learn more about how we ensure your bags' safety when you're in the trenches.
